text:
Happy Hallerween!
Tyler Perry's next Madea movie, "Boo! A Madea Halloween," is filming now in Atlanta. He'll be back in his multiple roles as both pistol-packing, wisecracking Madea and her brother and sparring partner Joe. (And also the more straightforward Brian). Perry posted these photos on his public Facebook page. Check out his transformation!
Tyler Perry posted these great photos from the set of "Boo! A Madea Christmas." Check out his transformation! (Also why is he holding an extra set of hands..?)
It also stars Bella Thorne, who previously had roles in the movies "Alvin and The Chipmunks: Road Chip," "The Duff" and "Blended" and the TV show "Red Band Society," all of which were filmed in Atlanta; and Instagram hottie Brock O'Hurn.
